table-entry.name: PLAYER
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,name varchar(200),country varchar(200),logo blob,created timestamp

table-entry.name: SQUAD
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,name varchar(200),logo blob

table-entry.name: TEAM
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,name varchar(200),logo blob

table-entry.name: CLAN
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,name varchar(200),logo blob

table-entry.name: FIXEDSQUAD
table-entry.col-data: playerID varchar(200) primary key,FOREIGN KEY (playerID) REFERENCES PLAYER(id)

table-entry.name: SQUADALTERNATE
table-entry.col-data: playerID varchar(200) primary key,FOREIGN KEY (playerID) REFERENCES PLAYER(id)

table-entry.name: SCRIMMAGE
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,customRoomID varchar(200),creatorID varchar(200),map varchar(20),block int,created timestamp,FOREIGN KEY (creatorID) REFERENCES PLAYER(id)

table-entry.name: GAME
table-entry.col-data: playerID varchar(200) primary key,kills int,position int,FOREIGN KEY (playerID) REFERENCES PLAYER(id)
